reference.title: Index service API
reference.shortdesc: The Index service REST API provides configuration options for the Index service.

section.title: Description
section.p: Couchbase Server has data, index, and query services that can be enabled. All of services can be enabled on a Couchbase Server node or a single service can be enabled on a Couchbase Server node. Each node is as a member of a cluster.

row.entry: Retrieves information about nodes in a cluster.
The indexMemoryQuota parameter sets the memory quota for the Index service.
Retrieves parameter settings for the Index service. Available options are indexerThreads, maxRollbackPoints, memorySnapshotInterval, and stableSnapshotInterval.
Sets the parameter settings for the Index service.
